short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: From Chrome Developer Console, highlight elements to get JavaScript code. Built by: Triangle Digital (Triangledigital.xyz)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸš€ Build Custom JS Variables with Ease!

Highlight any text on a webpage, click the extension, and instantly generate the JavaScript needed to extract your highlighted content. Perfect for creating custom JavaScript variables in Google Tag Manager (GTM) or any other platform that requires variables from a page (e.g., ID, title, value, phone, email, etc.)!
